metadata.title: CVE-2013-7439 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple off-by-one errors in the (1) MakeBigReq and (2) SetReqLen macrosin include/X11/Xlibint.h in X11R6.x and libX11 before 1.6.0 allow remoteattackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted request, which triggersa buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxrender1 - 1:0.9.8-1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxrender package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.8-1build0.14.04.1').
